relation: I'm just beginning here but my sister goes here. I enjoy the campus, the food, the track and the education seems well. I am happy to attend La salle!
pageTitle: La Salle University Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
textBeforeTable: 03/23/2011 Reviewer is Accepted here and planning to attend soon. Reviewer has not been to campus. 3 out of 3 people found this review useful. 1 of 44 Aurora from Las Vegas, NV Check out reviews left by other students or leave your own review. textAfterTable: Bang for the buck I hope it's worth the high price. It is a private school with small classes and a great atmosphere so I hope it stays worth it. Will enjoy being here There are a lot of clubs and things to do after and in between classes. It's in Philadephia; surrounded by historical sites and fun activies all around. Will learn a lot The Nursing Program is supposed to be amazing and I can't wait to start working with the professors. They have a lot of opportunities for work experience as well.
